titleStmt.title: [Here begynneth the table of a book entytled the book of good maners.]
Livre de bonnes moeurs. English
titleStmt.author: Legrand, Jacques, ca. 1365-1415.
Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by William Caxton, of: Legrand, Jacques. Le livre de bonnes moeurs.
Pagination and signature collation from Duff.
Imperfect; lacks leaves a1 (title page) and h10.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
